job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Blackstone Talent Group, an award-winning technology consulting and talent agency is seeking a Senior Site Reliability Engineer (SRE) to join our client in a 100% remote opportunity! Looking for AWS or GCP experience and a background in back-end development. Some of the opportunity highlights; • Worldwide market leader • Will be building out and supporting new product lines • 100% Remote • Full time, permanent/direct hire opportunity Sr. SRE will be building out & supporting new product lines that collect analytics/data from retail locations across the globe. Ideal Candidate will have the following: 5+ years SRE experience Strong Backend dev experience Strong AWS or GCP experience Experience with Kanban Python, GO or Terraform experience Work in an environment where you can focus on big problems. Low on meetings and overhead. We are a community of makers and we want people with the same mindset. Focused on building great solutions to the problems our customers face.
